name: Nutrient listing status
functionStatement: Nitrogen and phosphorus transformations feed primary production, regulate excess loads, and store or release nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Nutrients near natural/guidelines unless higher levels are normal (e.g., blackwater).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Check available impairment listings and monitoring summaries for nutrient-related causes or indicators (for example nitrogen, phosphorus, chlorophyll, nuisance algae).

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: No known nutrient impairment and monitoring does not indicate persistent issues.

levels.label: Suboptimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Not listed, but limited data or occasional elevated indicators.

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Nutrient impairment is documented or listed for part of the reach or assessment unit.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Nutrient impairment is documented or listed with persistent symptoms such as frequent blooms.
